Class SecurityHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rmit.eres.seaports.helpers.SecurityHelper

  • public class SecurityHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class facilitating the interaction with Spring Security's 'SecurityContextHolder', and authentication in general.
    Author:
    Guillaume Prevost
